title: Hide the Elephant
description: Forcefully-retired zoo-keeper Mick Munroe is hiding two BIG Alzheimerâ€™s and a 42 year-old Indian elephant called Sinbad. Mick and his elephant become overnight on-the-run, anti-hero legends when Mick, an old rebel with a cause, takes matters into his own hands. The Alzheimer's brings Mick something very an adventure he never thought possible with his dear old friend, Sinbad.
author: Jonathan  Dunne
